author: Special Correspondent
text:
The bronze Nataraja idol which was retrieved from the Tamirabharani on Monday night.

A bronze idol of Lord Nataraja was recovered from Tamirabharani river on Monday night when a man was fishing in the river.

When Kaliraj (43) of South Chezhiyanallur was fishing in the Tamirabharani near Manimurtheeswaram here, a one-and-a-half-foot-tall bronze idol got entangled in the fishnet. On retrieving the idol, he informed the police about it.

The police, who took custody of the idol, later handed it over to District Revenue Officer M.G. Kulandaivel.
title: Nataraja idol recovered from Tamirabharani
